originalText.text: A dear friend with perfect skin urged me to try Wendy and am I ever grateful! A long time facial lover and skincare junkie, I was so pleased with my results.  The fact Wendy suggested less products and really cared about streamlining my routine sealed the deal.  You are in great hands with Wendy and the pricing is also very fair.

text.text: A dear friend with perfect skin urged me to try Wendy and am I ever grateful! A long time facial lover and skincare junkie, I was so pleased with my results.  The fact Wendy suggested less products and really cared about streamlining my routine sealed the deal.  You are in great hands with Wendy and the pricing is also very fair.

originalText.text: I cannot speak highly enough about the skincare services I enjoy at Synergy Therapy. Wendy is an expert at all things facial. Since I started seeing her almost a year ago, my face is no longer dry and blotchy. Her treatments have eliminated these issues, which I had for years and unsuccessfully tried to treat at other places and at home. Plus, friends and colleagues have actually commented on how great my skin looks, and some people have said I look younger! I also love the products available at Synergy Therapy. They allow me to keep up with my skin care in between each of Wendy’s treatments. The office is sophisticated, clean, relaxing and private. And as a bonus, Wendy is not only super smart when it comes to skincare, she is also extremely lovely! I highly recommend Wendy at Synergy Therapy without any reservations!

originalText.text: I have been going to Wendy for skincare and facials for over a decade and followed her when she used to work at other spas. I was thrilled when she opened up her own practice on CPW. Her spa is clean, welcoming and comfortable. Wendy is a true professional and tailors everything to your needs. Her prices are very reasonable and she’s the loveliest person. I can not recommend Wendy and Synergy Therapy highly enough!

text.text: I have been going to Wendy for skincare and facials for over a decade and followed her when she used to work at other spas. I was thrilled when she opened up her own practice on CPW. Her spa is clean, welcoming and comfortable. Wendy is a true professional and tailors everything to your needs. Her prices are very reasonable and she’s the loveliest person. I can not recommend Wendy and Synergy Therapy highly enough!

originalText.text:
I've known Wendy for over 10 years now and would recommend her to anyone who has even an iota of concern about their skin or skincare regimen. She doesn't try to upsell or push products she doesn't believe in and use herself. She truly cares about her clients and adept at identifying exactly what you need for your skin type.

She takes the time to explain why your skin may be misbehaving and recommends the appropriate treatment plan. She will just as quickly recommend outside products as she would her own. She will change the way you look at skincare for the better.

originalText.text: A real gem. If you are trying to choose between this place and somewhere else, just do yourself a favor and choose this place.
